comment: Professor Parke is amazing! Please take him if you can

I didn't plan on taking Professor Parke's class until the beginning of the semester, but I'm glad I took it. He is a very great guy, he teaches the material well, and gives out key pointers. There are four tests and a group project. He lets you use a piece of paper, which you can put anything on, to use on your tests. 10/10 definitely recommend.
Professor Parke is the best! He is so nice, helpful and cares about his students.

My man Perry!! Guys this is a MUST take professor. You actually learn from his lectures along with being just a very likable person. Group project is hefty but very doable. 18 pages single spaced with 5 people. You have the whole semester. Tests are open note (Sheet of paper) and his review slides are literally the test. MUST. TAKE.
Very easy class and amazing professor. I could happily take another class by him and I highly recommend you take him if you have the chance!

Professor Parke is caring, nice and overall pretty good for a first time professor. He gives no HW, 4 tests, and a semester long 18-20 pg. paper with a 15 min ppt presentation which he has no control over. He allows a cheat sheet for tests which are pretty easy. Show up and do the group project you will be fine.

I loved Professor Parke. He did amazing, especially for his first time teaching. Group Project that was pretty difficult, but he graded fairly. Four tests where you can bring a cheat sheet that are simple as long as you prepare off the review slides. He is super funny and great to be around. I think he will only do better for future students!

Perry is a very nice professor and i enjoyed his class. 4 tests which are medium difficulty, he lets you have a cheat sheet on all 4. Group project thats 18 pages single spaced, but its not that bad either. All in all nice guy and medium difficulty class. Gotta put effort in, but if you do that youll pass.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Test heavy--Group projects

comment: Professor Parke is very knowledgeable in his field. He knows what he is talking about and this class is enjoyable if you participate. Tests are not difficult but do require some studying. I would absolutely take Professor Parke again for any class.
